meanings.sent1: The postvaccination period is when the body builds immunity.
meanings.sent2: It is important to monitor postvaccination symptoms for any adverse reactions.
meanings.sent3: The postvaccination celebration included a cake shaped like a syringe.
meanings.sent4: Her postvaccination relief was like a weight lifted off her shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The postvaccination glow of health was evident in her smile.

meanings.definition: Relating to the period following vaccination.
meanings.sent1: Postvaccination care involves keeping the injection site clean.
meanings.sent2: The postvaccination instructions should be followed carefully.
meanings.sent3: The postvaccination party had balloons in the shape of vaccines.
meanings.sent4: The postvaccination journey was a step towards community health.
meanings.sent5: The postvaccination phase marked a new chapter in disease prevention.
